: : Drakangel : :
He flies after the point of empact.
Darkangel: Yeah, I'm picking something up. It could ahve been a pod or a ship. C'mon Dreadplague, lets check this out.
 Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:Dreadplague: Slag! What was that?!?

She moves in closer but was still at a good distance.

Dreadplague: Darkangel, do you sense this too? It's almost like the
thing has an energy signature of its own!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: How about splitting the difference down the middle somewhere?
> 
> ???????::
> 
> Out in space, a small, damaged rocket ship plunges down into the 
> atmosphere.  The heat of re-entry turns the artificial meteor into a 
> flaming comet as it plows into the ground ahead of the two Tripred 
> warriors.
>

> > 
> > OOC: I though they were going for the Pred base. They should be
